capability.name: Business Risk Models
capability.definition: This capability focuses on developing and maintaining comprehensive business risk models that assess commercial and business exposures across various failure scenarios to support risk mitigation strategies.
capability.role: Develop and maintain models that assess commercial/business exposures
capability.example: Financial engineers develop and deploy a collection of business risk models that can run against different failure scenarios to assess exposure and determine mitigation needs
